# GitHub Copilot Instructions for OT Edge

## Project Overview
OT Edge is a Next.js application built with TypeScript, React, and Tailwind CSS.

## Code Style & Conventions
- Use TypeScript for all files
- Use functional components with hooks
- Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- Follow Next.js 15+ conventions (App Router)
- Prefer named exports for components
- Use descriptive variable and function names

## Git Workflow
- Use terminal commands for git operations (not GitKraken tools)
- Commit messages should be clear and descriptive
- Combine operations: `git add -A && git commit -m "message" && git push`

## Development Preferences
- Keep code concise and readable
- Use modern ES6+ syntax
- Implement accessibility best practices
- Optimize for performance

- Git user: ryanwhetstone (whetstone.ryan@gmail.com)
